title: Bring back the woolly mammoth!
description: It’s the dream of kids all around the world to see giant beasts walk the Earth again. Could -- and should -- that dream be realized? Hendrik Poinar talks about the next big thing: the quest to engineer a creature that looks very much like our furry friend, the woolly mammoth. The first step, to sequence the woolly genome, is nearly complete. And it’s huge.
author: Hendrik Poinar
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, animals, anthropology, deextinction, evolution
